section.section: Except as provided in paragraph (2) of this subsection, the tobacco tax rate for other tobacco products is 30% of the wholesale price of the tobacco products.
In this paragraph, "premium cigars" has the meaning stated in § 16.5-101 of the Business Regulation Article.
Except as provided in subparagraph (iii) of this paragraph, the tobacco tax rate for cigars is 70% of the wholesale price of the cigars.
The tobacco tax rate for premium cigars is 15% of the wholesale price of the premium cigars.
